ground_truth: He goes inside, where Nick and Kurt are playing video games. The next night, a laid-back Nick strolls along a walkway at a Travel Inn. Clean-shaven with short dark brown hair, he wears jeans and a shirt with the sleeves rolled up. He comes to a room and knocks gently on the door, which Dale answers, leaving the security chain fastened. Nick grabbed him. Dale and Kurt run to the window and see a man dressed in black get out of a black muscle car, and Kurt and Dale share an excited look and clench their fists. Kurt pauses to compose himself, then opens the door and speaks as a sharp-suited man wearing dark glasses enters the room, takes off his shades, and throws a plastic sheet down. The guys are in Kurt's car as they drive into a rough neighborhood and near a bar. They enter the bustling bar filled with a shady clientele. Kurt nods to a musclebound guy as they head to the bar, to a Latino, and finally to the heavyset black barman, who bridles. A guy eyes them as they leave—the same guy from inside. They follow the black guy, who has a shaven head and several tattoos. Jones glares at them as Harken smashes his office wall down with a sledgehammer. With his extended office now complete, Harken removes a strip of clear plastic from a plaque on the door and buffs it with his sleeve. Nick glowers and then withdraws money from his bank account. Meanwhile, balding Bobby Pellitt is partying hard with three Thai hookers in skimpy underwear, snorting a line of cocaine from one's stomach as they writhe in orgiastic abandonment. He's in his office while Kurt's in the main office and frowns as Bobby's bare torso presses up against the window. At home, Kurt raids a private stash of money. In the main office, Bobby looks over at Kurt, gives him the finger, and smooches with one of the women as Kurt frowns. Bobby's shirt is open, exposing his bloated stomach, and he holds up Hank's handicapped parking pass. At the dentist, Julia licks the back of Dale's neck, then sucks his left earlobe and jams her tongue in his ear. Dale furrows his brow as she tweaks his nipples, then grins and slaps his ass. Wearing a black hoodie and dark glasses, Dale withdraws money from a cash point in a gas station mini-mart. Later, the guys sit opposite Jones at a table in a dingy bar, pushing a large briefcase towards him. Jones opens it to find it empty apart from a small bundle of bank notes, snaps it shut, sips his drink, and beckons them closer. They lean forward as he reaches inside his jacket.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Nick and Kurt play video games inside. The following night, Nick, relaxed and clean-shaven, strolls in jeans and a rolled-up shirt at a Travel Inn. He gently knocks on a door, met by Dale, who keeps the chain fastened. Nick grabs him, and Kurt and Dale see a man in black exiting a muscle car, sharing an excited look. Kurt composes himself, opens the door to a sharp-suited man with dark glasses who enters, removes his shades, and lays down a plastic sheet. Kurt, Dale, and Nick drive into a rough neighborhood, entering a bustling bar with a shady crowd. Kurt nods to muscular men, including a Latino and a barman. A guy watches them as they leave, the same one from earlier. They follow a tattooed man with a shaved head. Jones glares as Harken demolishes his office wall with a sledgehammer. Harken, with his new office, cleans a door plaque. Nick retrieves money from his bank account, while Bobby Pellitt parties with Thai hookers, snorting cocaine. Kurt frowns as Bobby's torso presses against the office window. Back at home, Kurt raids a money stash. At work, Bobby makes a rude gesture at Kurt and shows off Hank’s handicapped parking pass. At the dentist, Julia makes unwanted advances on Dale, who reacts with discomfort. Later, Dale, in a black hoodie and dark glasses, withdraws cash. The group meets Jones in a dingy bar, sliding a briefcase to him. Jones discovers it nearly empty, closes it, and gestures them closer, reaching inside his jacket.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: He enters, finding Nick and Kurt gaming. The next night, Nick, clean-shaven with short hair, walks casually at a Travel Inn in jeans and a rolled-up shirt. Arriving at a room, he knocks; Dale opens, leaving the chain fastened. Nick grabs him. Dale and Kurt see a man in black leaving a muscle car, share an excited look, and clench fists. Kurt steadies himself, opens the door, and addresses a sharp-dressed man entering, who removes his shades and drops a plastic sheet. The group drives to a rough neighborhood bar filled with shady patrons. Kurt nods at a muscular guy, a Latino, and a surly black bartender. As they leave, a man eyes them. They follow a tattooed, shaven-headed man. Jones glares as Harken demolishes a wall in his office, expands it, and polishes a plaque. Nick withdraws money. Bobby Pellitt parties with Thai hookers, doing drugs in his office. Kurt frowns as Bobby's bare torso presses the window. At home, Kurt takes from a private stash. Bobby taunts Kurt in the main office, exposing his stomach and holding a parking pass. At the dentist, Julia teases Dale, who frowns. Dale, in a hoodie and glasses, withdraws cash at a gas station. Later, they meet Jones in a dingy bar, presenting an almost empty briefcase. Jones shuts it, drinks, and signals them closer. They lean in as he reaches inside his jacket.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
He confidently steps inside, where he finds Nick and Kurt deeply engrossed in a session of playing video games. On the following night, with a relaxed demeanor, Nick casually strolls along a walkway at a local Travel Inn. Clean-shaven and sporting short, dark brown hair, he wears comfortably fitting jeans paired with a shirt, the sleeves of which are neatly rolled up. He arrives at a room and gently knocks on the door, which is answered by Dale, although he leaves the security chain fastened. Nick then quickly grabs him. Meanwhile, Dale and Kurt rush over to the window, where they witness a man clad in black exiting a sleek black muscle car. Kurt and Dale share an excited glance and clench their fists in unison. After a brief pause to collect his thoughts, Kurt opens the door and begins speaking just as a sharply dressed man, wearing dark sunglasses, steps into the room. He removes his shades and nonchalantly tosses a plastic sheet onto the floor.

Later, the trio finds themselves inside Kurt's car as they drive into a neighborhood known for its tough reputation, eventually stopping near a bustling bar. They enter the crowded establishment, which is filled with a clientele that appears somewhat shady. Kurt acknowledges a muscular individual with a nod as they make their way toward the bar, acknowledging a Latino man and finally reaching the heavyset black barman, who reacts warily. As they leave, a guy inside the bar eyes them suspiciously—the same individual from before. They decide to follow a black man, who has a shaved head covered with several tattoos. Jones shoots them a fierce glare as Harken forcefully demolishes his office wall with a sledgehammer, expanding his office space. With his newly extended office now complete, Harken meticulously removes a strip of clear plastic from a plaque on the door and buffs it with the sleeve of his shirt.

Nick watches with a glowering expression as he withdraws money from his bank account. Meanwhile, balding Bobby Pellitt is indulging in a wild party with three Thai hookers dressed in revealing underwear, snorting a line of cocaine from one of their stomachs as they writhe in ecstatic abandon. Bobby's in his office while Kurt's in the main office, frowning as Bobby's bare torso presses blatantly against the window. At home, Kurt gathers funds from a private stash of money. Back in the main office, Bobby shoots Kurt a defiant look, flipping him off with his finger before smooching one of the women as Kurt continues to frown. Bobby’s shirt is left open, revealing his bloated stomach, as he holds up Hank's handicapped parking pass. At the dentist, Julia provocatively licks the back of Dale’s neck, then proceeds to suck on his left earlobe and forcefully jabs her tongue in his ear. Dale furrows his brow in discomfort as she tweaks his nipples, then grins mischievously and gives his ass a playful slap.

Later on, wearing a black hoodie and dark glasses, Dale withdraws money from an ATM at a gas station's mini-mart. The scene shifts to a dimly lit, grimy bar, where the guys sit across from Jones at a table, pushing a large briefcase toward him. Upon opening it, Jones finds it nearly empty apart from a small bundle of banknotes. He quickly snaps it shut, sips his drink with a knowing air, and motions them to lean in closer. They oblige, leaning forward as he reaches inside his jacket for something.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
With a sense of self-assuredness, he confidently steps inside the room, where his eyes quickly fall upon Nick and Kurt, who are deeply engrossed and completely absorbed in an intense session of video game playing. Fast forward to the following night, and with a relaxed and easygoing demeanor, Nick casually strolls along a well-used walkway at a local Travel Inn. He presents a neat and tidy appearance, being clean-shaven and sporting short, dark brown hair. His attire consists of comfortably fitting jeans paired with a shirt, the sleeves of which are neatly rolled up, suggesting a casual yet put-together look. Upon arriving at a particular room, he gently knocks on the door, which is slightly opened by Dale, although he leaves the security chain fastened for precaution. Nick then makes a quick move, grabbing Dale decisively. Meanwhile, Dale and Kurt hurry over to the nearby window, where they catch sight of a man dressed in all black exiting a sleek, black muscle car. Sharing an excited glance, Kurt and Dale clench their fists in unison, silently communicating their enthusiasm. After a brief pause to collect his thoughts and steady his nerves, Kurt opens the door and begins to speak just as a sharply dressed man, wearing dark sunglasses, strides into the room. With a swift motion, he removes his shades and nonchalantly tosses a plastic sheet onto the floor.

Subsequently, the trio finds themselves seated inside Kurt's car as they navigate their way into a neighborhood that is known for its tough reputation. Eventually, they bring the car to a stop near a bustling bar. Upon entering the crowded establishment, which is filled with a clientele that appears somewhat shady, Kurt acknowledges a muscular individual with a nod as they purposefully make their way toward the bar. Along their path, they acknowledge a Latino man and finally reach the heavyset black barman, who reacts with a wary demeanor. As they make their exit from the bar, a man inside the establishment eyes them with suspicion—it’s the same individual they encountered earlier. They make a decision to follow a black man, who sports a shaved head adorned with several tattoos. Meanwhile, Jones directs a fierce glare at them as Harken aggressively demolishes his office wall using a sledgehammer, expanding his office space. With the newly extended office now complete, Harken meticulously removes a strip of clear plastic from a plaque on the door and buffs it with the sleeve of his shirt to ensure it shines.

Nick, on the other hand, observes with a glowering expression as he withdraws money from his bank account. Meanwhile, the balding Bobby Pellitt is indulging himself in a wild and exuberant party with three Thai hookers clad in revealing underwear, snorting a line of cocaine from one of their stomachs while they writhe in ecstatic abandon. Bobby is positioned in his office as Kurt stands in the main office, frowning as Bobby's bare torso presses blatantly and unapologetically against the window. At home, Kurt takes a moment to gather funds from a private stash of money. Back in the main office, Bobby directs a defiant look at Kurt, flipping him off with his finger before leaning in to smooch one of the women, all while Kurt continues to frown. Bobby’s shirt is left open, deliberately revealing his bloated stomach, as he holds up Hank's handicapped parking pass. At the dentist, Julia provocatively licks the back of Dale’s neck, then proceeds to suck on his left earlobe and forcefully jabs her tongue into his ear. Dale furrows his brow in discomfort as she tweaks his nipples, then grins mischievously and gives his ass a playful slap.

Later on, wearing a black hoodie and dark glasses for anonymity, Dale proceeds to withdraw money from an ATM located at a gas station's mini-mart. The scene then shifts to a dimly lit, grimy bar, where the guys find themselves seated across from Jones at a table, pushing a large briefcase in his direction. Upon opening it, Jones discovers it to be nearly empty except for a small bundle of banknotes. He quickly snaps it shut, sips his drink with a knowing air, and motions for them to lean in closer, hinting at something important. They oblige, leaning forward as he reaches inside his jacket for something, suggesting a forthcoming revelation.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He steps inside the room, taking in the scene where Nick and Kurt are fully immersed in playing video games, their fingers deftly moving over the controllers. The following night, Nick adopts a relaxed demeanor as he leisurely strolls along the walkway at a Travel Inn. His clean-shaven face and short dark brown hair complement his casual attire of jeans and a shirt with the sleeves rolled up, displaying a laid-back style. Upon reaching a specific room, he pauses and raps gently on the door. Dale, on the other side, cautiously opens the door just enough to peer out, keeping the security chain firmly fastened as a precaution. Nick abruptly reaches out, grabbing Dale, prompting a swift reaction. Dale and Kurt rush over to the window, hurriedly glancing out to witness a man in a sleek black outfit emerging from a black muscle car. This sight causes Kurt and Dale to exchange a look of exhilaration, each clenching their fists in a shared moment of excitement. Kurt takes a brief moment to regain his composure before opening the door and speaking with authority. As he does so, a sharply dressed man in a suit, sporting dark sunglasses, steps inside the room. With a cool demeanor, he removes the shades from his eyes and casually tosses a plastic sheet onto the floor. Later, the guys find themselves seated in Kurt's car, driving into a rough neighborhood that exudes a gritty atmosphere. They steer the vehicle towards a bar bustling with activity and filled with a clientele that exudes a shady aura. As they enter, Kurt gives a nod of acknowledgment to a musclebound guy, then proceeds to acknowledge a Latino and finally a heavyset black barman, who reacts with a guarded expression. They navigate through the crowd, aware of a man watching them closely as they exit—the same man from within the bar. With calculated steps, they trail behind the black guy with a shaven head adorned with several conspicuous tattoos. As tensions build, Jones fixes them with a piercing glare while Harken, with determined force, swings a sledgehammer to demolish his office wall. With the office extension complete, Harken meticulously removes a strip of clear plastic from a plaque on the door and polishes it with the sleeve of his shirt, ensuring it shines to his liking. Meanwhile, Nick, his expression sullen, proceeds to withdraw money from his bank account. In a contrasting scene, balding Bobby Pellitt indulges in a wild party, surrounded by three Thai women clad in minimal clothing. In a hedonistic haze, Bobby snorts a line of cocaine from the stomach of one woman as they cavort with uninhibited abandon. Inside his office, Bobby's bare torso presses provocatively against the window as Kurt, frowning, watches disapprovingly from the main office. Later, at home, Kurt raids his secret stash of money, preparing for whatever comes next. Back in the main office, Bobby casts a dismissive glance at Kurt, flipping him off with a crude gesture before engaging in an impromptu kiss with one of the women, his shirt left open to expose his bloated stomach. He nonchalantly holds up Hank’s handicapped parking pass, flaunting it with a sense of twisted triumph. At the dentist's office, Julia behaves provocatively, licking the back of Dale's neck with calculated audacity. She tantalizingly sucks his left earlobe and unabashedly plunges her tongue into his ear. Expressing discomfort, Dale furrows his brow, yet Julia continues by tweaking his nipples, then unexpectedly grins and delivers a playful slap to his rear. Later, Dale, incognito in a black hoodie and dark glasses, stealthily withdraws money from an ATM at a gas station mini-mart, maintaining a low profile. Subsequently, the group converges at a table in a dimly lit bar, seated across from Jones. They slide a large briefcase across the table towards him, anticipation hanging in the air. As Jones opens it, he discovers it nearly empty, save for a modest bundle of banknotes. Unfazed, he snaps the case shut with a decisive movement, takes a deliberate sip of his drink, and gestures for them to lean in closer. He peers intently at them and, with a calculated motion, reaches inside his jacket, preparing for the next unfolding moment.

Kurt nods to a musclebound guy as they head to the bar to a Latino and finally to the heavyset black barman who bridles. A guy eyes them as they leave—the same guy from inside. They follow the black guy who has a shaven head and several tattoos. Jones glares at them as Harken smashes his office wall down with a sledgehammer. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. With his extended office now complete Harken removes a strip of clear plastic from a plaque on the door and buffs it with his sleeve. Nick glowers and then withdraws money from his bank account. Meanwhile balding Bobby Pellitt is partying hard with three Thai hookers in skimpy underwear snorting a line of cocaine from one's stomach as they writhe in orgiastic abandonment. He is in his office while Kurt's in the main office and frowns as Bobby's bare torso presses up against the window. At home Kurt raids a private stash of money. In the main office Bobby looks over at Kurt gives him the finger and smooches with one of the women as Kurt frowns. Bobby's shirt is open exposing his bloated stomach and he holds up Hank's handicapped parking pass. At the dentist Julia licks the back of Dale's neck then sucks his left earlobe and jams her tongue in his ear. Dale furrows his brow as she tweaks his nipples then grins and slaps his ass. Wearing a black hoodie and dark glasses Dale withdraws money from a cash point in a gas station minimart. Later the guys sit opposite Jones at a table in a dingy bar pushing a large briefcase towards him. Jones opens it to find it empty apart from a small bundle of bank notes snaps it shut sips his drink and beckons them closer. They lean forward as he reaches inside his jacket.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The bird flies outside, where Mike and Sam are juggling oranges. The previous morning, a cheerful Mike dances through a garden at a Resort Villa. Bearded with long curly blonde hair, he sports cargo shorts and a tank top with the sleeves torn off. He reaches a cabin and stomps loudly on the fence, which Finn opens, leaving the porch swing swaying. Mike hugged him. Finn and Sam dash to the balcony and watch a woman dressed in red hop out of a green sports bike, and Sam and Finn exchange a puzzled glance and scratch their heads. Sam hesitates to calm down, then shuts the gate and whispers as a casually-dressed lady wearing bright scarves skips into the cabin, puts on her flip-flops, and spreads a cotton blanket down. The ladies are in Sam's van as they cruise through a quiet suburb and close to a café. They arrive at the lively café filled with a cheerful congregation. Sam winks at a lean girl as they approach the counter, to a Canadian, and lastly to the petite white cashier, who smiles. A girl observes them as they exit—the same girl from outside. They shadow the white woman, who has curly hair and multiple bracelets. Smith grins at them as Carson builds his garden fence up with a crowbar. With his extended garden now ready, Carson replaces a string of colored flags from a banner on the gate and dusts it with his cap. Mike giggles and then deposits coins into a vending machine. Meanwhile, hairy Timmy Winters is relaxing peacefully with three French bakers in snug pajamas, sipping a cup of coffee from one’s mug as they laugh in synchronized harmony. He’s in his bedroom while Sam’s in the living room and giggles as Timmy’s covered foot leans against the wall. At work, Sam moves a hidden collection of coins. In the living room, Timmy glances over at Sam, waves him a high-five, and winks at one of the bakers as Sam giggles. Timmy’s pajama top is buttoned, concealing his large foot, and he shows off Frank’s flower-scented air freshener. At the salon, Stella tickles the front of Finn’s nose, then pinches his right cheek and taps her fingernail on his ear. Finn raises an eyebrow as she pats his shoulders, then smirks and pokes his belly. Wearing a bright scarf and round glasses, Finn deposits coins into a snack machine at a convenience store gas station. Earlier, the ladies stand with Smith at a booth in a cozy café, sliding a small envelope towards him. Smith opens it to see it filled except for a tiny batch of lottery tickets, closes it quickly, sips his tea, and gestures them nearer. They lean back as he stretches inside his backpack.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Nick and Kurt play video games, while a composed Nick walks to a Travel Inn where Dale cautiously opens the door. After spotting a man in black exiting a muscle car, Kurt and Dale share a knowing look. They enter Kurt's car, heading to a shady bar where they acknowledge various patrons. Soon, they follow a tattooed man as Harken demolishes his office wall for expansion. Later, Nick withdraws money, while Bobby Pellitt parties in his office with scantily-clad women, as Kurt frowns at the spectacle. At the dentist, Julia makes advances on Dale, who awkwardly endures her actions. Dale, in disguise, withdraws cash at a gas station. Finally, the group meets Jones in a dingy bar, presenting him with an almost empty briefcase.
